title: did the alcoding club finish their recruitments in ecc?

comments.body:
yes, we do recruitments during odd semesters

although, i dont speak for all clubs, but most of them, including alcoding, will allow you to join regardless of recruitment schedules given that you're actually interested in the theme of the club

after all a club is just a group of students with a shared interest, and no club wants to exclude talented people based on arbitrary schedules

if you want to join, please do contact us via email or the club instagram

most offline alcoding events happen in RR campus, but it shouldnt be long before we're able to fully open an ec campus exclusive branch
